subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mike Modano scored his second goal of the game 35 seconds into overtime last night and Marty Turco made 23 saves for the Dallas Stars, who collected their sixth consecutive victory with a 3-2 win over the host Islanders.
snippet: Mike Modano scored his second goal of the game 35 seconds into overtime last night and Marty Turco made 23 saves for the Dallas Stars, who collected their sixth consecutive victory with a 3-2 win over the host Islanders.
